entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
